Package managers

Class ShowtimeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.ShowtimeManager
  • public class ShowtimeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the entity labelled Showtime. Contains the logic to link showtime to other classes.
    Since:
    2019-11-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    penel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ShowtimeManager()
      Checks if array list of showtime objects is null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShowtimeManager

        public ShowtimeManager()
        Checks if array list of showtime objects is null. If null, data from the csv file is written to the list.

    • Method Detail

      • getShowtimeByID

        public Showtime getShowtimeByID​(int showtimeID)
        Iterates through records to compare given ID against list of IDs for a showtime.
        Parameters:
        showtimeID - Unique identification number given to a showtime.
        Returns:
        Showtime that is present in records.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the result is empty.
        Returns:
        Boolean value representing whether the result is empty.

      • bookSeat

        public void bookSeat​(Showtime showtime,
                     int seatNo)
        Takes in user input on which seat to be booked. Adds booked seat to chosen showtime.
        Parameters:
        showtime - Showtime selected by the user.
        seatNo - Seat number selected by the user.

      • create

        public Showtime create​(java.time.LocalDate date,
                       java.time.LocalTime time,
                       int movieID)
        Creates a single showtime given the date, time and movie that will be screened.
        Parameters:
        date - The date of the showtime.
        time - The time the showtime starts.
        movieID - The movie to be screened at the showtime.
        Returns:
        The new showtime created.

      • removeShowtime

        public void removeShowtime​(Showtime showtime)
        Removes a single showtime from the database given the Showtime object.
        Parameters:
        showtime - The showtime to be removed.

      • updateMovie

        public void updateMovie​(Showtime showtime,
                        int movieID)
        Updates a showtime's information. A user chosen attribute of the showtime will be updated.
        Parameters:
        movieID - Unique identification number of movie.
        showtime - Showtime selected by user.

      • updateDate

        public void updateDate​(Showtime showtime,
                       java.time.LocalDate date)
        Updates the date attribute under showtime.
        Parameters:
        showtime - Indicates the specific showtime, whose date needs to be changed.
        date - Indicates the new date of the showtime.

      • updateTime

        public void updateTime​(Showtime showtime,
                       java.time.LocalTime time)
        Updates the time attribute under showtime.
        Parameters:
        showtime - Indicates the specific showtime, whose timing needs to be changed.
        time - Indicates the new timing for the showtime.
